boAt Return and Replacement Policy:

boAt offers product replacement within 7 days of delivery.

Products can be replaced under these conditions:
1. Product delivered in defective condition within 24 hours of receipt
2. Product has physical damage within 24 hours of receipt
3. Product delivered is not functioning properly within 7 days from the date of delivery
4. Product received is not as shown on the site or as per the specifications (reported within 24 hours)

Products will NOT be replaced under these conditions:
1. Customer is not happy with the look/sound quality of a defect free product
2. Physical damage not notified within 24 hours of receiving the product
3. An electrical surge or any damage caused by the user

Order cancellation policy:
1. Cancellations not entertained if orders have already been communicated to customers and shipping has been initiated
2. No cancellation of orders placed under the Same Day Delivery category
3. No cancellations are entertained for products obtained on special occasions

Summary: boAt primarily offers replacements for defective or damaged products reported within specified timeframes. Returns and refunds are generally not provided, but replacements are offered within 7 days for eligible cases. Cancellations are allowed before shipping, excluding Same Day Delivery and special occasion orders. Report issues within 24 hours.
